sentences.en: " I dono -- peep through the crack.
sentences.cn: “ 我不知道,你从缝里往外瞅 瞅.

sentences.en: "Fourteen minutes," Chris said, taking a peep at his watch.
sentences.cn: “14分钟,”克里斯瞥了一眼他的手表说道.

sentences.en: A few flowers peep out in February.
Children came to peep at him round the doorway.
sentences.cn: 孩子们围在门口偷看他。

sentences.en: I got a quick peep at him through the crowds.
sentences.cn: 我从人群中很快地扫了他一眼.

sentences.en: I took a peep through the keyhole.
sentences.cn: 我从钥匙孔偷看了一眼.

sentences.en: It's impolite to peep at others.
Let me have just one peep at the letter.
On our website you can peep our video interview with R&B’s newest supergroup.
sentences.cn: 在我们的网站可以观看到节奏布鲁斯最新超级组合的采访录像。

sentences.en: One peep out of you and I cut your throat.
sentences.cn: 你要是通风报信,我就宰了你.

sentences.en: Peep ! Peep! Went the little car.
sentences.cn: 嘟! 嘟! 小车子开动了.

sentences.en: The little chicks began to peep because they were hungry.
sentences.cn: 小鸡因为饿而开始吱吱叫.

sentences.en: We can get a peep of a distant waterfall through the trees.
sentences.cn: 我们可以透过树丛隐约看见远方的瀑布.

sentences.en: We set off at the peep of day.
You don't hear a peep from her once she's gone to bed.
sentences.cn: 她一睡觉，就不会发出一点儿动静。

sentences.en: You've only seen a peep through the curtain.
sentences.cn: 你还只是隔着帘子瞥见一眼罢了.

words.tran_cn: 窥视；慢慢露出，出现；吱吱叫

trans.tran_cn: 窥视，唧唧声，隐现，慢慢露出
trans.tran_en: a quick or secret look at something

trans.tran_cn: 瞥见， 偷看； 初现
trans.tran_en: to look at something quickly and secretly, especially through a hole or opening
to look at something quickly and secretly, especially through a hole or opening

trans.tran_cn: 窥视，偷看，（小鸟等）唧唧地叫，（从隐蔽处）出现
trans.tran_en: to look at something quickly and secretly, especially through a hole or opening
to look at something quickly and secretly, especially through a hole or opening
